website_summaries.verdict: This stretchy T-shirt has an attractive slim-fit cut with few seams to help lower the risk of heat rashes.
pros: Polyester and spandex material makes the shirt very stretchy
Sizes from small to 4-XL with tall sizes available
cons: A few users have said their shirt developed a hole after a few uses

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT get sunscreen on this shirt - Permanently wrinkled
customer_reviews.text: I received the shirt and promptly put it on over top of a sunscreened back and chest. The sunscreen residue got on the shirt which made it wrinkle a tad. Upon two washes, the shirt remains wrinkled where it touched sunscreen. Not pleased with the way this shirt reacted to sunscreen. It obviously has to be worn with sunscreen around your arms, face, etc - so this seems to be poor quality or bad planning. Material does feel soft, but would not purchase again given the wrinkles - this was after 5 minutes of wear...
customer_reviews.author: A. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Material on this version is so much better and thicker
customer_reviews.text: This replace an older shirt. Material on this version is so much better and thicker. Great shirt.
customer_reviews.author: K. Shorrock

customer_reviews.title: Good shirt/runs small
customer_reviews.text: Great swim shirt, these shirts do come small I’m 52 yrs old 6’ 197lbs medium build I reordered to a 2XL. I wear XL in everything. If you buy your normal size it will be to tight. Quality of shirt is good
customer_reviews.author: monte e hornung

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protection!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my husband before we went to Florida and it worked GREAT while we were there! The sun was out bright and it was really warm every single day and this completely protected his front/back that was covered by this shirt. It was pretty true to size with great stretch. A large (typically his normal size, occasionally a medium) fit him perfect! Also, it was much cheaper than most other brands out there, but still reputable! We would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: BrittanyNG

customer_reviews.title: Does  exactly what it's supposed to do. Good quality shirt.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use in Mexico for one week, during the recent hot weather. It performed very well in my opinion. I also loved how the wet shirt kept cool after exiting the water, until after it dried. It's saved me a lot is sunscreen, since I'm not applying any to my chest anymore. This shirt ran a little small for me; I'm normally a 40 t-shirt & bought a large size. It works, but slightly larger woulda made taking off the wet rash shirt easier in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: O'Neill
customer_reviews.text: Just go mine in today I tried it on and it fits perfectly witch I'm shocked about cuz I got a size medium so I was worried at first but no it's all good. I could have gone down to a small but I didn't want to risk it and you don't want it too tight to where it won't fit and not being able to move. why did I get a medium instead of a large you ask well cuz I wanted it a little bit more form fitting but not too tight. I had a size large and that was good to but I wanted more of a tight feel.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit and protecting me from too much sun (UPF 50)
customer_reviews.text: I like the style and color for the water - that is personal choice. Sizing - I'm 5'10" & 215lbs and this is a slim fit X-Large. These shirts are meant to be fitted so you don't have the friction swimming and this is the way it fits. I wear things a bit loose given my weight, so I was a bit uncomfortable with the fit at home. Once in the water, it feels just right. If I want to look better in these kinda shirts, I gotta put the beer down and get to the gym - where's my beer?
customer_reviews.author: James Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Way too small, skin tight small
customer_reviews.text: This beyond a doubt an amazing, comfortable, and cool shirt. Unfortunately and disappointed I had to return the shirt as it was skin tight in a 2X. I do mean skin tight. If you're muscular or heavy set, expect it. If you're a slim fit, this would probably be a very nice shirt. That said, they do run small and I would still order one size larger, even if you're an XL. Depite it's sizing and having to return, I still think it's a certified 5 star rating for the appropriate body type.
customer_reviews.author: BottomLine

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I will definitely be purchasing more of these. Keeps those shoulders covered from reflection off of the water. It doesn't stretch out in the water or get heavy like a standard cotton T-shirt would. It dries very quickly once you're out of the water. Went hiking the next day and I noticed my husband was wearing this "swim" shirt. When I asked him why he responded, "Why not, it's just as nice as my Nike dry-fit"
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: XL Blue
customer_reviews.text: 185 lb. 5'8" broad shoulders. XL fits just about the same as a regular-fit Large t-shirt, but it looks a bit tighter due to how the material drapes/the cut of the shirt. I wish I had an XXL in these to compare but, I am leaving the country next week, so no time. In most shirts I wear a large.
customer_reviews.author: GoodTimes

customer_reviews.title: Smelly and Small!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most chemical toxic smelling shirt I have ever bought! You might expect that from a mattress topper or something but this is awful. After 3 washes and as many swims it still stinks like a chemical factory. And the complaints about sizing are accurate as well. Can't send it back because it's been used but run the other way on this one folks.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great sun shirt.
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these from O'neill in different colors. I like the thicker feel compared to other brands. This particular color seems a little smaller than the white and red versions I have. My only complaint on all of them is that after a couple washes the neck starts stretching.
customer_reviews.author: Santina

customer_reviews.title: Covered in stretch marks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shirt for my husband. On its 3rd wear, first wear at the beach it was covered in pulls. He did not swim or go in the water, and his chair was covered with a towel??? The shirt is now un wearable. On the plus side he did not get a sun burn the day he wore it
customer_reviews.author: Kaydale

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt and a new essential for water activities.
customer_reviews.text: Used for the first time in recent trip to the Dominican Republic. The long sleeve version is much tighter than short sleeve version (short sleeve slightly more comfortable to wear) and both protect very well from sun, keep you cool and allows unrestricted motion through water. Drying out while wearing takes a bit longer than anticipated. I found myself wearing this shirt even when we were not going swimming. It’s a great all around shirt and stays cool when wearing around town. For swim activities it’s a new must have!
customer_reviews.author: Maddie White

customer_reviews.title: Nice rash guard shirt
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfortable shirt. I swim in it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: JimC

customer_reviews.title: It fit perfectly. On my 14 yr old.
customer_reviews.text: This is the tightest shirt I've ever put on. I cried it hurt so bad. I thought I'd be stuck in it forever. The fire department was nearly called to help remove it... buy it 3 sizes too big unless you want to asphyxiate.
customer_reviews.author: Rupert Pupkin

customer_reviews.title: Quality, great fit, wear anywhere, SPF 50
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike. Perfect fit, feel and look. Exactly what you expect from "O'NEILL". Great indoor and outdoor performance shirt. Hit beach yesterday in Palm Beach about 90 degrees for over two hours of direct sunlight, and yes the SPF is there. Absolutely works. Glad you make quality products as you have for many years. Always been a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Avello

customer_reviews.title: Either the large black L/S is an extra Large or the Large white S/S is a Medium
customer_reviews.text: I purchase a long sleeve black large slim fit SPF shirt some weeks ago and never used it. It fit so well I ordered a short sleeve white large slim fit SPF shirt. It fit more like a girdle than a shirt. I placed both shirts together and took a picture. The black large shirt is more than one inch longer. The black large shirt is more than one inch in width. This is the reason I purchased one at a time from Amazon. Either one is an extra large or the other is a medium. Joe Murphy
customer_reviews.author: Joseph B Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great for swimming and snorkeling in the sun!
customer_reviews.text: I used this shirt for a week in the Caribbean snorkeling and swimming. Although pricey, it is comfortable in and out of the water, dries fast, and blocks the sun well. I rinsed it in fresh water each day and it looks like new. I used only reef-safe, zinc-based sunscreen on my neck and arms and saw no ill effects on the shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Will S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect protection from the sun!
customer_reviews.text: My oldest in going into high school this Fall and transitioning into adult clothing. I bought the slim fit because my son is skinny and it fit him perfectly. We love the name brand and we also love quality. Having a UPF 50+ is great for coverage from the sun. He wears it in the pool and at the beach. It is perfect protection from the sun!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great swimming shirt
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shirt due to SCUBA diving in the Bahamas. Now under stand this is a compression shirt so it's designed to be tight, however it doesn't feel constricting. It did a great job of keeping me comfortable with the BC and tanks and held up well after 14 dives. Also did a great job of protecting me from the sun. It's a great shirt and I highly recommend if you need one for the water.
customer_reviews.author: Halftwit2

customer_reviews.title: Love the style and quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this short-sleeve rash guard for an upcoming trip to Hawaii. Very happy with the style and quality. At 6'4" and 185 pounds, the XX Large fits slightly loose (like the model in the product images). I can see myself wearing this most of the day, even after I leave the water. I ordered in black because I read other reviewers complain about lighter colors becoming stained by sunblock. I also ordered the long-sleeve versionwhich is just as well made. Oddly, the Large long-sleeve fits me the same as the XXL short-sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: O’Neill upf  50 t-shirt
customer_reviews.text: The T-shirt is of polyester fabric allowing the shirt to not absorb sweat similar to my bicycle jerseys. Also cool to wear during warm weather. Id have to assume it protects my skin from Ivan ray because I can’t prove it. It’s the reason I bought it to help protect my skin when the sun is up high and scorching hot day
customer_reviews.author: obetsr51

customer_reviews.title: True to size and great price!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical while reading the reviews because you never know until you actually have the product in hand, very impressed after recieving the item! My husband had a more expensive one from another brand a few years ago but unfortunately it got ruined in the dryer, so he needed a new one for our beach vacation, this one is half the price and much nicer! Fits true to size, I purchased XL for my husband who is normally an XL and it fits great!
customer_reviews.author: thejoyfultribe

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for our Vacation to Punta Cana 4-7-19 in his first wear the product discolored to a yellowish spots from white. My son swam in the pool and beach only. The shirt was loose fit on my son but the sides threads loosen and open up. Pictures shows what happen after one wear.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Ozgun

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME FIT, NICE QUALITY, BUT SMELLS LIKE FISH!
customer_reviews.text: So we were very excited about this purchase and the fit. It is very slim fitted so if you want a little looser/not clinging to the skin order a size up. However, I noticed a very pungent rotten fish odor. My bf said it was the chemical UPF that caused the smell and he didn't mind it, but if you're sensitive to smells, you might want to wash this immediately (however the label directs).
customer_reviews.author: TheObserver

customer_reviews.title: If fits more like a medium
customer_reviews.text: Not true to size at all!! Extremely tight even though I ordered a 2XL! If fits more like a medium, seriously! Beware of the "slim fit" labels, especially if you're not the "slim fit" type... Very disappointing of an otherwise stylish swim shirt... :(
customer_reviews.author: norbac

customer_reviews.title: Knock Off
customer_reviews.text: Received a knock off item. Looks nothing like the picture and not even made out of the correct material. The “tag” looks like a photocopy.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Buy 1 size up.
customer_reviews.text: My husband normally wears a size L, but based on reviews we ordered XL. Fits perfectly. He is 6'2" and 200 lbs. Covers him perfectly. Fits loosely like a t-shirt. Great sun protection. The color is more like a ROYAL BLUE, and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Briggsy

customer_reviews.title: Fits a little big
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice rash guard but if it’s a little big, based on the other reviews, I bought a size up and I wish I hadn’t. I am 6’2, 215 pounds and usually fit pretty nicely in an extra large so I bought a double extra large. It fits like a loose baggy shirt but we will see what happens when I wash and dry it
customer_reviews.author: Matt G

customer_reviews.title: O'Neill UPF 50 Sun Shirt
customer_reviews.text: This shirt fits pretty tight. It clings to the body, which might make it a good rash guard. It kept the sun off of me in the Caribbean, so it did this job right. You will want to take care of the fabric by hand washing it, or you will get streaks in the fabric. It works great in the water, it will not balloon up on you. Overall a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bukowski

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Use this shirt for long runs in the sun. Sweat doesn't stay on the body during the run. Body stays cool compared to running in cotton shirts. ALmost feels as if your not wearing anything. Good buy. Prob buy another one soon ..
customer_reviews.author: CrazedMonkey

customer_reviews.title: Nice swim shirt. Feels great. Unless you want a skin tight shirt, consider bumping up 2 sizes for a relaxed slim fit!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5' 11'' and weigh 173 lbs. I bought the Medium, it was skin tight. I bought the Large, it was skin tight. I bought the X-Large and that was the slim fit I wanted! For comparison, I bought the Amazon Essentials Men's Swim Tee in a Medium and the fit was similar but more loose than the X-Large O'Neill. I like the O'Neill feel and construction and I think it will last several seasons.
customer_reviews.author: bmal1

customer_reviews.title: Nice shirt, but my tire is still a full size spare
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice shirt for the beach. It's not tight to the skin but I have just a little pouche/ spare tire and it still is a bit tight in that area, enough to notice my tire either Toyo or Good Year, either way, if I lose a few pounds it will be alright. If I could do it again I would purchase the looser fit that O'Neill has on here.
customer_reviews.author: McMeekin

customer_reviews.title: Designed as a T-shirt and not for swimming/snorkeling in mind.  Go one or two sizes up...if you have a tire or two.
customer_reviews.text: Returning it. 1) There is no loop at the bottom - to tie into board shorts. 2) Its also a little snug for me. Size wise: not flattering for a fat person with a tire. I wear XXL usually and i find it comfortable in Tshirts, but I got this in XXXL thinking it would be baggy but it was tight. 3) The heathered look aslso is not that appealing in person. 4) The description says "Tee," and its simply a T-Shirt. I dont think its functional for use in the water for swimming or snorkeling....only wearing while out in the sun. Other than the size issue and look of the color, it functionally great as a Tshirt
customer_reviews.author: Romy P

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, you have to pay to return
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend to buy this 1 or 2 size bigger. Plus careful because yo have to pay shipping to return (almost 8 dollars) and for what I received Im getting like 2 or 3 dollars les that the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jayleen Adorno

customer_reviews.title: Quality is there sizing is not quite accurate
customer_reviews.text: The sizing is not accurate at all. I initially ordered the xl which felt like a typical large size T-shirt. Then I ordered a xxl that was actually closer to a medium in fit. The quality was good, and returning the product was a breeze. Just make sure to go up a few sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight sun protection
customer_reviews.text: Shirt had a hole in armpit, but did not notice until removed for use and was too late to exchange. That being said, worked great to protect from sun. Lightweight, fast drying, soft material.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Neck was way stretched out!
customer_reviews.text: Material was nice, the fit was pretty accurate for me. I always wear mediums in everything and ordered a large and it was a bit big. I could of worn a medium most likely. The only bad part was the neck! it was stretched out beyond belief. ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Foo

customer_reviews.title: so I am pleased. I also purchased the Kanu Surf Men's CB ...
customer_reviews.text: At 5'6" and 165lbs (muscular build w/ 42" chest), I am a difficult shape to size and prefer to wear loose clothing. For t-shirts, I normally wear a size L. These shirts fit about the same, so I am pleased. I also purchased the Kanu Surf Men's CB Rashguard Swim Tee in size L and found them also to fit as desired. I find these tees to feel thicker and heavier (I personally prefer thinner and lighter for comfort). However, I have yet to try either brand in water nor to test their UV protection.
customer_reviews.author: BF

customer_reviews.title: My son likes this shirt
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my son. Reports are that it fits him well and the color (Dusty Blue) will go with pretty much anything. Got a size large, he is 6’2”, ~215 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Kearney Momma

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and looks good. Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and nice looking. I am disabled and started aquatherapy to resume exercises. I bought the shirt to keep me warmer in the pool since temps very wherever I go. I will update once I test it in the water. A comment on sizing. I got XXL so that I don't look like a sausage in the shirt. Of course, for most people my size XXL means that it's time for a serious diet, but that's a different issue. Hint: buy black to hide your stomach and buy it large enough for comfort, especially while wearing it in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Bayesian

customer_reviews.title: Buy in dark if you want to wear it with sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these after buying a house with a pool. I got some tattoos and like to keep them out of the direct sun. The shirt itself is fine but the collar and sleeves had a really bizarre reaction with spray on sunscreen like you get at the drug store. The collar and sleeve ends are green now from overspray of the sunscreen. Never imagined a reaction like this. Could be chlorine in the pool played a role, but now the shirt looks too gross to wear after wearing just twice. Washing in hot with bleach failed to remove the weird green stains. If I had it to do over again I'd go darker.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous shooter

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my brother for our trip to the ocean. He is very fair skinned and burns very easily. This kept him from getting burnt. He said it was comfortable and that he really like it. It’s very well made for such a good price
customer_reviews.author: christina haake

customer_reviews.title: O'Neill Rash/Sun guard
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size large and it is true to size; fits well, but not so tight that it is difficult to pull off when wet. The skin is very comfortable to wear and move in. It appears to be a durable, yet light fabric and the stitching is secure. I use it mostly for surfing. I use long-sleeved sun protection shirts when not in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Very tight fitting shirt
customer_reviews.text: If you like a very tight fitting shirt this is the one for you. Personally I was disappointed in it, fit wise so I gave this shirt to my fat wife and she likes it.
customer_reviews.author: william taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Short Sleeve!
customer_reviews.text: My husband love this shirt! He had been wanting a short sleeve white rash guard...the one that he loves was getting a little dingy. He normally wears a medium but I purchase a large. I find it best to always go one size up. This is more of the slim fit so it is tighter in the waist. Great for water activities!
customer_reviews.author: J Green

customer_reviews.title: I must for Myrtle Beach.
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is a great shirt for protection at the beach, and it Allows you to play in the ocean or at the pool and not have to worry about sunscreen except on the arms and neck and face and legs, protect yourself, get out there and enjoy the beach with the Fam 🏖
customer_reviews.author: Jacksdaddy from  N.C

customer_reviews.title: waaay too small
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how oneill size their products but this thing was 2 sizes smaller than anticipated and went straight back unused, as it was too late to reorder for the upcoming trip. i think these are some of the products that one has to buy in a brick and mortar store
customer_reviews.author: Max Wycisk

customer_reviews.title: Terrific shirt!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous shirt! It totally blocked the formidable Australian sun from this pale-skinned Irish guy. And BONUS - it's incredibly comfortable. I slept in it more than one night; it's very soft and a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Henry J. Mcgill

customer_reviews.title: Nice...
customer_reviews.text: I followed the size chart and ordered the 2XL recommended for my weight. I was worried that it would be too large but it isn't, I still have a little bit of room. It isn't skin tight on me but I didn't want skin tight anyhow... just some protection from the Caribbean sun while snorkeling. I like the material, soft and elastic. Seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ullrich

customer_reviews.title: Hide your beer belly and not get sunburned on your back
customer_reviews.text: In my youth I used to tan before trips to Mexico. Since Ive wised up with age, I don't tan anymore. Coupled with a beer belly I wanted a product that would keep me from getting sunburned and would hide my belly. I bought these swim shirts and was more than impressed. I normally wear xl t shirts so I ordered 1 xl and 1 xxl swim shirts. Both work but I wish I would have went with xl for both. Out of the water the xxl is ok (a bit baggy but relaxed) but in the water it weighs you down. Very high quality and sporty looking.
customer_reviews.author: C Clark

customer_reviews.title: Sun protection and comfort is great
customer_reviews.text: Sun protection and comfort is good enough, my only problem is it is not lightweight enough. It gets heavier after a swim. The color is nice.
customer_reviews.author: NYC-Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great feel and looks
customer_reviews.text: Love these shirts by O’Neill. Loose enough so that they aren’t skin tight. I wear this one, and the two long sleeve ones all the time. And I’m not at the beach all the time either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protection and reflection.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a lake trip. Very comfortable and lightweight. Helps block and reflect heat from the sun. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Joel M.

customer_reviews.title: It fits too large.
customer_reviews.text: We have worn many O'Neill swim shirts in our family. The most recently received men's shirt fit much too large for swimming but okay for jogging. It was not skin tight as it should be. It was a disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen  S.F.

customer_reviews.title: Tricky fit, quality shirt.
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Quality. I think I’m in between sizes, but got a large. Could’ve gotten a medium, but I’m happy with a little more room. I’m 5’11 160lbs, average build.
customer_reviews.author: Chris James

customer_reviews.title: It should be specified that the shirts are "fitted" Thats why I am giving a 3 star
customer_reviews.text: I exchanged for a bigger size and yet it didn't fit my Fiance' its for slim people I guess lol Overall the quality seemed pretty good but size is off by whats actually described, annoying! now I have to return both shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Isis L.

customer_reviews.title: Fit was way way disappointing ..
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a swim shirt... I normally wear a large Tee so I ordered this shirt in XL.... it fit tighter then my under armor compression shirts I use for working out.... only order this if you go up several sizes or want it to fit like a latex glove.
customer_reviews.author: Danno

customer_reviews.title: Great for preventing sunburn!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much your average 'dry fit' material type of t-shirt/ workout shirt. I opted for this instead of any of the dryfit shirts hubby already has only because it has an spf rating, but once you feel it, its not much different than the other workout shirts he has. On the plus side, it just means he gets extra use out of it as a workout shirt when we are not out at the beach or in the sun. He wound up using it for a snorkeling trip and it sure saved him from horrible sunburn on his back!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis O

customer_reviews.title: Great T for all uses
customer_reviews.text: Great swim shirt. Form fitting athletic cut. Its a bit heavy but breathable. I have several and have worn in tropical heat/locations.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to wear it in Mexico.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this shirt for an upcoming trip to Mexico. Very nice, good fit and construction. I was worried about it being too tight (I could stand to loose a few pounds around my waist) but it was just loose enough to be flattering but retaine the sleek quality of the design. Overall, it is a great addition to my O'NEIL board shorts for poolside and sun baked playas.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Aucoin

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I love the shirt but washed it once and the letters started coming off. Was gonna buy another one but really doubtful now.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: It is a great shirt. But somewhere we missed that it said ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a great shirt. But somewhere we missed that it said slim fit. It fit my husband around the chest but would not pull over his gut. HAHA Just be sure that your man is built like the Rock before you make this purchase. Unless you are into the crop top look of your man. HAHA I gave it to my brother in law.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: If you’re looking for a fitted rash guard, keep looking
customer_reviews.text: This is huge. Definitely fits more like a loose medium than a small. Color is nice, but sending back. It’s just too big.
customer_reviews.author: Educated Family

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great & looks good
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a sun sensitive red head - will update my review if it doesn't keep performing as well as it did at first
customer_reviews.author: A. McMillen

customer_reviews.title: Bad print quality
customer_reviews.text: Began peeling already, after one wash. Otherwise not a bad shirt but peeled letters isn't a good look. I washed in cold water.
customer_reviews.author: nyan

customer_reviews.title: Not a swimsuit, more like a loose tee shirt. Surprising bad quality from O'Neil
customer_reviews.text: Unsuitable for being in water. It is too loose and floats around your body rather than sit tight around it. Difficult to swim with this due to its looseness. Also after 4 days of use one of the seams tore.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick van der Hart

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Great color. I'm 6'3", 205lbs and the XL fit perfectly with good length. I'll likely buy this same model in another color. I have a couple other O'Neill rash guards (a really loose T-shirt type, a long sleeve tight fitting one) and they all have held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Nitrousbird

customer_reviews.title: Athletic fit, great for ocean sports
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to wear for our trip to Mexico for when we go boogie boarding. Last year he went without a UPF rash guard and his Polish skin paid the price. I had ordered a cheaper brand but it was too boxy and loose-we don’t need his rash guard billowing like a sail in the ocean. He was very pleased with this fit-he is 6’3” and 200 lbs, and likes the athletic fit of this rash guard.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Z

customer_reviews.title: unless you like you belly showing like you are in your 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: Too tight for someone that is not packing a 6 pack. I have a 12 pack, and it showed. This is for a fit surfer, not your average joe, unless you like you belly showing like you are in your 2 trimester.
customer_reviews.author: CRDubleU

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: This shirt does not fit as expected. Normally, I wear an Xl so I ordered that size for this shirt. What I received fits like a medium. If I had known, I would have ordered a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: FF582D/E

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protection shirts
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these. My son loves them. They are substantial not flimsy and hold up well through ocean swimming and washings. Thanks great product and great value.
customer_reviews.author: Ami

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and comfortable for wearing out in the sun and swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Jim / Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, affordable & functional
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad for his vacation and he really loved it. He looked great in it. It was a semi-loose fit. It wasn't big like a t-shirt but also wasn't so tight where he felt like he was in a wet suit. The O'Neill rash guards are made really well. It's nice to enjoy your day without worrying about reapplying sunscreen so much.
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, well made
customer_reviews.text: Not tested this for sum protection or even breathability yet but around the house it’s very comfy to wear. Nice quality material and stitching. Will probably buy another one in a different colour.
customer_reviews.author: Matt W.

customer_reviews.title: Sun protection that looks good and works great
customer_reviews.text: Worked great in the pool and the ocean in Cancun. Just don't get white, never wore it outside of the water and it still got discolored and spots from the sea weed in the water. Great product, fits very well not loose, and does great protecting from the sun
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Fits and performs as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Great swim shirt and it fits true to size. It keeps the sunburn away and it dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy

customer_reviews.title: Form fitting, lightweight, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: No dislikes, very happy with the product, enough to buy a second one in another color
customer_reviews.author: Dennis D.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: i give 5 stars because it deserves, the product quality is very high, I satisfied 100%, thank you very much such a great product
customer_reviews.author: Alim namaz

customer_reviews.title: Great to layer under a wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a vacation but have mostly been layering it under a 4/3 wetsuit for Northern California winter water. It's comfortable and adds some game-changing warmth. With this plus a hood I don't dread going out in the cold dawn water anymore. I just rinse and hang it like a wetsuit, and it's kept its shape just fine and doesn't stank. I wouldn't throw it in the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: David Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protection & Accurate sizing
customer_reviews.text: Ordered L which is my usual T-shirt size and fit was just right. Not too tight (like some others that make you feel like a sausage) and not too loose (doesn’t trap air and bubble up). Holding up fine in pool/ocean so far providing the expected sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t give it anything less than 5 stars. It is my fault it was too small.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding beach shirt
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a long day at the beach in the water swimming and snorkeling. Great colors available so you are highly visible in the water. I always trust O'Neill products!
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Iriarte

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and functional
customer_reviews.text: XL Snug but not tight. Dries fast. Feels cool on the skin when wet which is nice on hot days in the Midwest. I purchased this to prevent sunburn on my back. I'm in the water a lot. This shirt allows me to keep playing without having to keep reapplying sunscreen in places that are hard to reach. I'm 5'7" 193 lbs with 45" chest.
customer_reviews.author: Goyo P

customer_reviews.title: Way smaller than a normal XL
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure this shirt is fine, but I’m leaving a review to draw attention to the sizing. I’ve worn an XL for the last 20 years and this is way to tight to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Runs true to size
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt. Im 5'5" 155lbs and the size small fit perfectly. Runs true to size. The fit is slim fit not skin tight (performance)as other styles which i do not fit.
customer_reviews.author: ramayra

customer_reviews.title: Missing loop
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace one that was worn out. The original had a loop at the bottom right in the front; used to tie your bathing suit. The new one didn't have a loop. Took the loop off of the original and sewed it on to the new one.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Oesterreicher

customer_reviews.title: Really nice shirt
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely pleased with this shirt. It protected me very well for 10 days of boogie boarding in the Florida sun and surf. The gray color held up very well. I stuck to hand washing it or washing it on delicate. Hung to dry. I like how it is made, it stayed right, but not like a compression shirt. I am 185 pounds, and I ordered one size up. I would suggest going a size bigger than you normally wear. That is my only reason for not giving a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dries relatively fast in the open air and has a nice, slim fit
customer_reviews.text: Saved my bu...back from getting a nasty sunburn. Dries relatively fast in the open air and has a nice, slim fit. Will be vacu-form fitting when coming out of the water, so just a heads up there for all you dudes with a little paunch. ;P
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: O’Neill comes through again!
customer_reviews.text: O’Neill comes through again! Im naturally a very pale person and pool/beach days were always a concern. These look great, feel great and most importantly protect me from feeling the beach for the next 2 weeks lobster status. 👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Love these O'Neill UPF 50+ sun shirts
customer_reviews.text: Love these O'Neill UPF 50+ sun shirts. Have purchased 4 over the last 2 years. Fits on nicely, looks great on, and provides sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: B. Dolan

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Have read the review about the sunscreen damaging the shirt and about wash cycles killing the lgo. I will keep an eye on that. My only grip is the logo is in silver and not black like in the picture but i can live with that one .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Rash Guard Sun Protection Shirt
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this swim shirt. Has a fantastic fit. Very comfortable in and out of the water. Nice bright color. Great sun protection. You can't go wrong with this swim shirt. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce B.

customer_reviews.title: Runs small - not "loose" fitting.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shirt. I would say this runs just a hair small. My husband wears an XL (and that's a loose fit on him), but the XL rash guard was very snug. Otherwise very nice
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.  Grove

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: comfortable and dries quickly, good for water sports and surfing
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Good fit. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for our trip to the beach. I am 5'10.5" 170-175lbs. I normally wear a large t-shirt. I ordered this in large. The fit is perfect. Like some reviews say, it fits a bit snugger than a normal t-shirt. However this is what you want as when it gets wet it will fit slightly larger. Fits close to the chest up top and more normal towards the waist. If you are looking for a baggy fit that compares more to a normal t-shirt then I would recommend going at least one size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FITS AS EXPECTED...
customer_reviews.text: I wear large everything and large fits me well. It's definitely tight everywhere, but it's supposed to be. If you want to wear this shirt and have a belly, size up.
customer_reviews.author: D. Grieco Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt. Bought several for my Husband in multiple colors.
customer_reviews.author: DWA

customer_reviews.title: Get two sizes up for loose
customer_reviews.text: It fits snug but not tight I'm a large and ordered and xl, I suggest buying two sizes up for a "looser" fit. If anything a good motivator to work out harder. Lol! I love the shirt Its comfortable and I reccomend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

product_meta.title: O'Neill Men's Basic Skins UPF 50+ Short Sleeve Sun Shirt
product_meta.description: Stay safe while you ride in the O'Neill rash tee. With UPF 50+ protection from seam to seam, this shirt delivers the highest level of protection from the sun's harmful rays so you can enjoy the sun without worries. You'll want to ride longer with the rash protectant, while the seamless paddle zones allow maximum flexibility with minimal seams for a chafe-free season. Embrace the sea in the O'Neill Men's Wave Basic Skins Rash T-Shirt.
feature_bullets: Slim Fit: Fits Close to Body, But Is Not Tight
Skin Cancer Foundation Recommended Product; UPF 50+ Ultraviolet Protection
Perfect For Surfing, Swimming, Paddle Sports, Boating, And Beach Days
Minimal Seam Placement For Maximum Rash Protection
